channel.title: The origin of MDMA(Molly, not ecstasy)
channel.description:
Hey guys, i'm doing my health assignment over spring break and we have to find a drug that wasn't in our textbook. I have to find a shit load of information but I can't seem to find where Molly is made and its origin.
Hope you drug experts know, thanks in advanced.

item.title: The origin of MDMA(Molly, not ecstasy)
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

Well yeah. With the additives and cut in shit obviously. But anyways, fuck drugs. Unless you’re the mighty Heisenberg.

Read full topic
item.source: The origin of MDMA(Molly, not ecstasy)

item.title: The origin of MDMA(Molly, not ecstasy)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Chrix, post:9, topic:515650”]Actually it is MDA in its purest form and comes as a crystal, MDMA is MDA with methanphetamine in it which is where the extra M comes from.

If I were you I would simply do a report on the newer synthesized drugs like spice or bath salt.[/quote]

This isn’t exactly right, there is no methamphetmine “added” to it unless you are just reffering to the regular name of the molecule.
MDA (3,4-methylenedioxyamphetamine)
MDMA (3,4-methylenedioxy-N-methylamphetamine)

The only difference is that MDMA has an N-methyl group added, making it a secondary amino. MDEA which is also a secondary amino, has an N-ethyl group.

Don’t let the methamphetmine in the name scare you. MDA is actually more toxic and dangerous than MDMA. (But that doesnt mean people should be doing either of them)

xxxtilllyxxx:

jme, MDMA is ecstasy, not the other way around. Ecstasy is a pill. MDMA is usually a powder. The powder can go multiple ways. 1) Turned into a blotter. 2) Turned into a capsule (molly), 3) Turned into a pill (ecstasy) and 4) Snorted as a powder.

I was only pointing out that while mdma is ecstasy, ecstasy is not always MDMA !

Read full topic
item.source: The origin of MDMA(Molly, not ecstasy)

item.title: The origin of MDMA(Molly, not ecstasy)
item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:
@Chrix wrote:

Actually it is MDA in its purest form and comes as a crystal, MDMA is MDA with methanphetamine in it which is where the extra M comes from.

If I were you I would simply do a report on the newer synthesized drugs like spice or bath salt.

item.title: The origin of MDMA(Molly, not ecstasy)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Even though the assignment is probably long done, theres lots of citable random information here. http://www.drugwarfacts.org/cms/Ecstasy#sthash.Y6d5tKQE.dpbs

xxxtilllyxxx:

Molly is ecstasy. MDMA is ecstasy in it’s purest form. I.e normally the powder form before it is made into a pill.

Yes but ecstasy is not always mdma. Ideally it would be.
